LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: How long was I out?

LABEL: 0x2CE
STRING: As if I'd been asleep, I suddenly woke up and jerked my head and upper body.

LABEL: 0x3F4
STRING: My head throbbed in pain.

LABEL: 0x412
STRING: I remembered how Touri had hit me.

LABEL: 0x44C
STRING: That's right, Touri――

LABEL: 0x46A
STRING: She wasn't doing well at all.

LABEL: 0x4A8
STRING: Judging by the silence, she didn't seem to be around anymore...

LABEL: 0x4EC
STRING: ――She was safe, right?

LABEL: 0x50C
STRING: Please be safe...

LABEL: 0x52C
STRING: I opened my eyes.

LABEL: 0x5A3
STRING: I couldn't see anything.

LABEL: 0x5BF
STRING: The warehouse had no lights on in the first place and was enveloped in darkness.

LABEL: 0x601
STRING: Something seemed to be laid over me.

LABEL: 0x635
STRING: Were these... cardboard boxes?

LABEL: 0x65B
STRING: Was this Touri's doing?

LABEL: 0x67D
STRING: My joints hurt because I was forced into an uncomfortable position by the weight on top of me.

LABEL: 0x6C7
STRING: 「Shit...」

LABEL: 0x748
STRING: 「Aaargh!」

LABEL: 0x762
STRING: I twisted my body and managed to get out, pushing the boxes off of me.

LABEL: 0x79A
STRING: This wasn't the time to be sleeping in a place like this.

LABEL: 0x7DA
STRING: How long had I been unconscious here?

LABEL: 0x87D
STRING: Ten minutes?

LABEL: 0x891
STRING: An hour?

LABEL: 0x8A6
STRING: Or maybe even longer...

LABEL: 0x8C0
STRING: This was the bottom of the sea as it is.

LABEL: 0x8E0
STRING: Even if the sun rose and set like normal, I was once again made aware that this was a place without any sort of daily rhythm.

LABEL: 0x94C
STRING: Also, the warehouse itself was deep inside the sunken <SHEEP III>,

LABEL: 0x9A3
STRING: and I couldn't tell what was going on outside at all.

LABEL: 0xA36
STRING: I stood up, supporting my heavy head and sluggish body.

LABEL: 0xA70
STRING: I couldn't see anything in the darkness.

LABEL: 0xA96
STRING: 「I didn't think I'd have to use it in a situation like this again...」

LABEL: 0xAD6
STRING: I rubbed my left wrist with my right hand.

LABEL: 0xB00
STRING: There was a cool sensation of metal.

LABEL: 0xB30
STRING: I pressed a button on the side of my watch and turned on its backlight.

LABEL: 0xBE9
STRING: 「All right.」

LABEL: 0xBFF
STRING: I had made use of this once before right after the accident when I had passed out on the bridge.

LABEL: 0xC3D
STRING: Even this broken wristwatch should still be useful as a simple light source.

LABEL: 0xC7B
STRING: Then again, I didn't know how long the batteries would last...

LABEL: 0xCD5
STRING: At the very least, let's pray that they'd last until I met up with someone.

LABEL: 0xD0D
STRING: I looked around the now-illuminated room.

LABEL: 0xD37
STRING: As I thought, Touri was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0xD5D
STRING: The interior of the warehouse was a mess.

LABEL: 0xD7D
STRING: Just to be sure, I walked along the walls, but there was no sign of anyone.

LABEL: 0xDC3
STRING: I somehow made it to the exit and put my hand on the door.

LABEL: 0xDFB
STRING: I was about to open the door, but stopped.

LABEL: 0xE2F
STRING: 「Right, that light――」

LABEL: 0xF16
STRING: I recalled that scene.

LABEL: 0xF32
STRING: A sea of light.

LABEL: 0xF48
STRING: A great number of luminous organisms had rushed in from the front section.

LABEL: 0xF8E
STRING: They might still be on the other side of this door...

LABEL: 0x1086
STRING: Timidly, I opened the door.

LABEL: 0x113C
STRING: There was no one there.

LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: There was nothing outside.

LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: The hallway was lit by a dim red light for some reason.

LABEL: 0x11B4
STRING: The brightness was equal to a pea-sized light bulb.

LABEL: 0x11F0
STRING: Had some of the power been restored?

LABEL: 0x121C
STRING: It was kind of half-assed for that... If anything, this was more like a makeshift solution.

LABEL: 0x1282
STRING: Still, I was grateful that I could make out the outlines of objects.

LABEL: 0x135C
STRING: My throat had been dry ever since I woke up.

LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: When I went back into the warehouse and rummaged through the things there, I found a plastic bottle right away.

LABEL: 0x13D8
STRING: 「Phaah...」

LABEL: 0x13F6
STRING: Okay.

LABEL: 0x140A
STRING: I wasn't at my full strength yet, but little by little, my mind and body began to work.

LABEL: 0x144C
STRING: I looked out the door of the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x14DC
STRING: There was nothing.

LABEL: 0x14F6
STRING: I couldn't see anyone.

LABEL: 0x1510
STRING: Silence. Not a single sound could be heard.

LABEL: 0x1536
STRING: From the looks of it, there didn't seem to be any luminescent creatures nearby.

LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: I took another sip of water from the bottle and left the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x1678
STRING: I put my hand on the wall and advanced through the watery floor.

LABEL: 0x16A4
STRING: Let's head to the front section first.

LABEL: 0x16CE
STRING: Not that I was concerned that the rear section would suddenly be submerged,

LABEL: 0x1718
STRING: but I was worried about where everyone else was.

LABEL: 0x1740
STRING: I wondered if they were all okay.

LABEL: 0x176A
STRING: My pace naturally quickened.

LABEL: 0x1862
STRING: A piercing pain assaulted the front of my head.

LABEL: 0x188E
STRING: I reflexively put my hand to my forehead, and the spot where Touri had hit me had turned into a large bump.

LABEL: 0x18E2
STRING: Internal bleeding, huh...?

LABEL: 0x18FE
STRING: Ever since I got on this ship, I felt like I'd been hitting my head all the time.

LABEL: 0x193E
STRING: I should have Hiragino examine me later.

LABEL: 0x1966
STRING: Still, she had hit me with all her strength.

LABEL: 0x19A0
STRING: Without thinking, I stroked my strangled neck.

LABEL: 0x19CC
STRING: It tingled painfully... There must be a scar there.

LABEL: 0x1A12
STRING: She was so caught up in her anger over Reiri that she seemed unable to grasp what was going on around her.

LABEL: 0x1AB7
STRING: Touri... What was she doing right now?

LABEL: 0x1AE5
STRING: I passed through the bridge and entered the front section once more...

LABEL: 0x1BB5
STRING: 「Heey!」

LABEL: 0x1BCD
STRING: I tried calling out just as I stepped foot into the lobby.

LABEL: 0x1C1C
STRING: There was no reply.

LABEL: 0x1C36
STRING: Only the echo of my own voice was there.

LABEL: 0x1C82
STRING: I strained my ears for a while, but I couldn't hear a single thing.

LABEL: 0x1CC2
STRING: On the contrary, there was no sound coming from inside the ship.

LABEL: 0x1CFC
STRING: It wasn't a matter of being noisy or quiet.

LABEL: 0x1D38
STRING: It was dead silent.

LABEL: 0x1D4C
STRING: A space that could only be described as "silent and empty."

LABEL: 0x1D84
STRING: I was starting to doubt even my own existence while standing in the middle of it.

LABEL: 0x1DD2
STRING: 「What is this?」

LABEL: 0x1DF0
STRING: 「There's... no one here?」

LABEL: 0x1E16
STRING: My hair stood on end.

LABEL: 0x1E3C
STRING: The story of the Mary Celeste crept back into my mind.

LABEL: 0x1EDE
STRING: All its sailors had disappeared at some point.

LABEL: 0x1F0E
STRING: A ghost ship left drifting along the waves...

LABEL: 0x1F2E
STRING: The inside of the ship was dark.

LABEL: 0x1F46
STRING: And outside this darkness, there was only the darkness of the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x1FE1
STRING: I had been left alone in these depths――

LABEL: 0x2031
STRING: Calm down.

LABEL: 0x20E9
STRING: 「Phew...」

LABEL: 0x2103
STRING: I forced a deep breath and suppressed my feelings.

LABEL: 0x2133
STRING: No good could come from being hasty.

LABEL: 0x2159
STRING: They had to be somewhere in here...

LABEL: 0x2187
STRING: The <SHEEP III> was a closed space.

LABEL: 0x21AC
STRING: A closed-off world.

LABEL: 0x21CA
STRING: There shouldn't be any way out of here.

LABEL: 0x21F8
STRING: If there was one, then... yes, it would have to be the ROMLES rescue team again.

LABEL: 0x223E
STRING: If everyone except me had made it back to the surface, then that was it.

LABEL: 0x2288
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x22A0
STRING: Until I was sure of that, I couldn't rest easy.

LABEL: 0x22DE
STRING: Touri, Tokiwa, Yukari, and Hiragino...

LABEL: 0x230C
STRING: There was a good chance they were still inside this ship.

LABEL: 0x233A
STRING: In the midst of the dark and red lighting, I began searching the front section.

LABEL: 0x2445
STRING: The first thing that came to my mind was the crew room on the second floor.

LABEL: 0x2477
STRING: The room where we all had told ghost stories earlier.

LABEL: 0x249F
STRING: I climbed the stairs and arrived in front of the room.

LABEL: 0x24CF
STRING: The door was half open...

LABEL: 0x24EF
STRING: I put my hand on the door and slowly pulled it open, peering into the room.

LABEL: 0x25AA
STRING: The room was dark.

LABEL: 0x25C2
STRING: The room, illuminated by the same dim light as the hallway, had traces of our time together left.

LABEL: 0x2622
STRING: To put it plainly, it was a mess.

LABEL: 0x264E
STRING: The food lined up on the table was still there, and the floor was littered with opened cardboard boxes.

LABEL: 0x269E
STRING: At this point, this scene was like a fond memory.

LABEL: 0x26DA
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x26F6
STRING: The wrapping of Tokiwa's chicken sandwich.

LABEL: 0x2730
STRING: When I picked it up, I could picture her struggling with it.

LABEL: 0x2764
STRING: Not much had changed from back then.

LABEL: 0x2794
STRING: And yet...

LABEL: 0x27AE
STRING: Where did their smiles, their warmth, disappear to?

LABEL: 0x27E8
STRING: 「Where is everyone...?」

LABEL: 0x280C
STRING: I muttered to myself.

LABEL: 0x2824
STRING: There was no point in asking a question with no one there to answer it, but...

LABEL: 0x2870
STRING: Even so...

LABEL: 0x288A
STRING: 「What about the wheelhouse...?」

LABEL: 0x28AA
STRING: I left the crew room.

LABEL: 0x298C
STRING: I went up to the third floor.

LABEL: 0x29A6
STRING: My eyes were getting used to the darkness by now.

LABEL: 0x2A33
STRING: I headed straight for the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x2A61
STRING: I didn't run into anyone along the way.

LABEL: 0x2A89
STRING: I didn't hear anything.

LABEL: 0x2AA7
STRING: If they could hear my footsteps, I was sure they'd respond...

LABEL: 0x2AFD
STRING: I hadn't encountered the light since waking up, either.

LABEL: 0x2B47
STRING: If I got ambushed from behind while I was wandering around by myself...

LABEL: 0x2B8D
STRING: I needed to hurry up and find the others.

LABEL: 0x2BBB
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0x2BD3
STRING: The wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x2C05
STRING: I put my hand on the door, but it didn't budge.

LABEL: 0x2C2F
STRING: I tried to open it by force, but it was a fruitless endeavor.

LABEL: 0x2C71
STRING: ...Was it locked?

LABEL: 0x2C95
STRING: Did that mean the power had been restored...?

LABEL: 0x2CC3
STRING: I took the master key out of my pocket and held it up to the door.

LABEL: 0x2D17
STRING: It unlocked with a light electronic sound.

LABEL: 0x2D45
STRING: Between this dim lighting and the keylock...

LABEL: 0x2D85
STRING: It seemed the electrical system was recovering after all.

LABEL: 0x2DB9
STRING: Still, how on earth――

LABEL: 0x2DE7
STRING: Did someone fix it?

LABEL: 0x2E03
STRING: The only one who could do that was probably Tokiwa...

LABEL: 0x2ED9
STRING: The moment I opened the door, I could see all sorts of equipment in the dim light.

LABEL: 0x2F17
STRING: Of course, they were all silent now.

LABEL: 0x2F45
STRING: All the displays were pitch black and the lights on the devices weren't lit at all.

LABEL: 0x2F91
STRING: Was the electrical system the only thing that had recovered...?

LABEL: 0x2FC5
STRING: What was going on?

LABEL: 0x2FE9
STRING: I stared blankly at the equipment in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x301D
STRING: As long as they were like this, there was nothing I could do...

LABEL: 0x3063
STRING: While feeling helpless, I approached――

LABEL: 0x30A1
STRING: 「Hey... What's this...?」

LABEL: 0x30CD
STRING: An unexpected sight left me speechless.

LABEL: 0x30F5
STRING: The main computer remained silent.

LABEL: 0x3123
STRING: There was just one display there.

LABEL: 0x314F
STRING: The rest of the equipment, now that I looked at it, was in pristine condition.

LABEL: 0x3181
STRING: It even looked like it could start working at any moment if it were turned on.

LABEL: 0x31BF
STRING: If it had power, that was.

LABEL: 0x31E1
STRING: That in itself was good.

LABEL: 0x31FF
STRING: That was good, but... there was one thing that was clearly strange.

LABEL: 0x3294
STRING: The communication equipment.

LABEL: 0x32AC
STRING: It had been destroyed.

LABEL: 0x32CA
STRING: Attached to the side of the main computer was our lifeline connecting the deep sea to the surface.

LABEL: 0x331C
STRING: It had been totally broken.

LABEL: 0x3346
STRING: This was nothing like the sabotage from earlier.

LABEL: 0x3392
STRING: There was no attempt to hide it.

LABEL: 0x33B8
STRING: It was simply physically destroyed.

LABEL: 0x343B
STRING: Nearby, there was a fire extinguisher.

LABEL: 0x3469
STRING: If I recalled correctly, this was something that was placed in the corner of the wheelhouse...

LABEL: 0x34A3
STRING: There were no signs of cleverness or scheming.

LABEL: 0x34C9
STRING: It was unchecked destruction, supported only by a will to carry out a goal.

LABEL: 0x350F
STRING: Destruction.

LABEL: 0x3523
STRING: All I could feel from this was an intense will,

LABEL: 0x354B
STRING: anger, and...

LABEL: 0x35C4
STRING: ――Despair.

LABEL: 0x36BF
STRING: 「Reiri―――!!」

LABEL: 0x36E6
STRING: I thought back to Touri's screams.

LABEL: 0x370C
STRING: My neck and forehead throbbed in pain.

LABEL: 0x372E
STRING: Was all this her doing?

LABEL: 0x3760
STRING: That was impossible... was what I wanted to think.

LABEL: 0x3796
STRING: I'd like to think it wasn't her, but...

LABEL: 0x382B
STRING: 「Did she...?」

LABEL: 0x384F
STRING: I couldn't rule out the possibility.

LABEL: 0x3873
STRING: She had lost her only family,

LABEL: 0x3895
STRING: her beloved sister, and had despaired at the rescue that would never come.

LABEL: 0x38DB
STRING: Maybe she was so desperate that she had exploded in anger.

LABEL: 0x38FD
STRING: That was a cheap scenario.

LABEL: 0x3919
STRING: However, I couldn't rule it out as impossible.

LABEL: 0x394B
STRING: What was the truth...?

LABEL: 0x3A09
STRING: ...What the hell had happened while I was unconscious?

LABEL: 0x3A61
STRING: Suddenly, I heard a sound from behind me.

LABEL: 0x3A95
STRING: 「Who is it?!」

LABEL: 0x3AAF
STRING: I turned around.

LABEL: 0x3AC7
STRING: And there――

LABEL: 0x3B4D
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x3B90
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x3BAC
STRING: Yukari stood there with a surprised look on her face.

LABEL: 0x3BD4
STRING: Thank goodness...

LABEL: 0x3BF0
STRING: I was naturally relieved to see a familiar face, but...

LABEL: 0x3C28
STRING: The expression on her face told me this wasn't something she had expected.

LABEL: 0x3C62
STRING: 「Hey, the communication equipment is――」

LABEL: 0x3CFC
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x3D18
STRING: 「Where have you been and what have you been doing all this time?!」

LABEL: 0x3D5F
STRING: Her tone was forceful, as if she was interrogating me.

LABEL: 0x3D85
STRING: 「What was I――」

LABEL: 0x3E3F
STRING: I had been knocked out by Touri.

LABEL: 0x3E6D
STRING: ――What would happen to Touri's position if I said that?

LABEL: 0x3EAB
STRING: There was no way I could say it.

LABEL: 0x3FD3
STRING: 「I was unconscious... in the warehouse in the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x4016
STRING: 「Unconscious?」

LABEL: 0x4034
STRING: 「Are you just saying whatever you want again?」

LABEL: 0x407D
STRING: 「No, it's the truth.」

LABEL: 0x409B
STRING: 「I escaped from that luminous creature and made it into the warehouse,

LABEL: 0x40D9
STRING: but got stuck under some cardboard boxes that collapsed on me in the dark.」

LABEL: 0x4127
STRING: I didn't lie to her, technically.

LABEL: 0x4151
STRING: It was true that I had been unconscious until now.

LABEL: 0x4189
STRING: Sure, I had no proof, but there was nothing to feel guilty about.

LABEL: 0x41F0
STRING: 「...Aargh!」

LABEL: 0x4211
STRING: Yukari scratched her head in irritation.

LABEL: 0x4241
STRING: ...I was a little surprised by her uncharacteristic behavior.

LABEL: 0x4279
STRING: Maybe this was her way of trying to remain calm.

LABEL: 0x42C5
STRING: She made no attempt to hide her exhaustion and the irritation that came from it.

LABEL: 0x4309
STRING: She sighed once, then looked up with narrowed eyes in exasperation.

LABEL: 0x43B9
STRING: 「You're quite carefree, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x43ED
STRING: 「Sleeping soundly in this situation.」

LABEL: 0x444A
STRING: I looked up at the LCD clock on the wall in surprise.

LABEL: 0x447C
STRING: It was nine o'clock――I felt like an idiot for not checking until now.

LABEL: 0x44C3
STRING: Had I been unconscious for that long?

LABEL: 0x44F7
STRING: No matter how tired I was, this was unacceptable...

LABEL: 0x4521
STRING: 「I'm sorry!」

LABEL: 0x453D
STRING: 「I didn't think so much time had passed... It's inexcusable.」

LABEL: 0x4581
STRING: 「I caused trouble for everyone...」

LABEL: 0x4617
STRING: 「Ah, no... I didn't mean to go that far...」

LABEL: 0x464D
STRING: 「――Sorry. "Carefree" was an exaggeration.」

LABEL: 0x46E6
STRING: 「In this environment, the stress and exhaustion we experience are extraordinary...」

LABEL: 0x4734
STRING: 「It's only natural that you fell asleep while unconscious.」

LABEL: 0x4794
STRING: 「There's no need to worry. It's important to rest.」

LABEL: 0x47E1
STRING: 「I really am sorry...」

LABEL: 0x4805
STRING: Yukari followed up.

LABEL: 0x4821
STRING: I guess her earlier irritated behavior wasn't her intention.

LABEL: 0x4875
STRING: My heart ached.

LABEL: 0x488D
STRING: She was the one who wanted to rest her body and mind.

LABEL: 0x48C9
STRING: Yukari probably hadn't slept much.

LABEL: 0x4909
STRING: There were slight dark circles around her eyes.

LABEL: 0x4937
STRING: 「That's right――」

LABEL: 0x4953
STRING: 「What about Tokiwa? Where is everyone?」

LABEL: 0x4983
STRING: I recalled the light surging in like a tidal wave.

LABEL: 0x49B7
STRING: And Tokiwa, who had disappeared beyond that.

LABEL: 0x49DF
STRING: It was hard to believe that seven hours had passed since then, but what in the world was she...?

LABEL: 0x4A92
STRING: 「Don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x4AB2
STRING: 「She should be in a room downstairs right now.」

LABEL: 0x4AE9
STRING: 「Downstairs?」

LABEL: 0x4B10
STRING: 「In the laboratory.」

LABEL: 0x4B31
STRING: The laboratory――

LABEL: 0x4B49
STRING: According to Tokiwa, an experiment to cultivate HeLa cells was conducted there.

LABEL: 0x4B8B
STRING: A memento... from Reiri.

LABEL: 0x4C1B
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san said there was something she had to do there.」

LABEL: 0x4C63
STRING: 「You... don't need to worry about her.」

LABEL: 0x4C9A
STRING: 「Yeah... Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x4CBE
STRING: I wasn't sure what Tokiwa was doing in the lab, but she must have her own ideas.

LABEL: 0x4D20
STRING: I completely agreed that there was no need to worry.

LABEL: 0x4D56
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x4D72
STRING: 「What the hell happened after that?」

LABEL: 0x4DA2
STRING: She exhaled lightly, and a faint smile appeared on her lips.

LABEL: 0x4E6A
STRING: 「I feel like I've been doing nothing but things like this recently.」

LABEL: 0x4EAB
STRING: Ahem. Yukari cleared her throat, then began to speak seriously again.

LABEL: 0x4F5B
STRING: 「After you and Touri-san disappeared...」

LABEL: 0x4F91
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san and I worked our way to a room in the rear section and made our way back to the front section afterward.」

LABEL: 0x504A
STRING: 「...We didn't abandon you.」

LABEL: 0x507C
STRING: 「Just in case, we went around the rooms after that to look for you two.」

LABEL: 0x50BE
STRING: 「But, when we called out to you, there was no response at all...」

LABEL: 0x5104
STRING: 「Before long, Tokiwa-san collapsed.」

LABEL: 0x5145
STRING: 「She collapsed!?」

LABEL: 0x51CD
STRING: 「She suddenly fell asleep.」

LABEL: 0x51FF
STRING: 「So, I had no choice but to turn back.」

LABEL: 0x528E
STRING: 「...Well, I can't blame you for thinking that we abandoned you. I apologize.」

LABEL: 0x52E3
STRING: 「Don't worry about it. I think that was the right decision.」

LABEL: 0x530D
STRING: We had no idea where the luminescent creature was lurking in this darkness.

LABEL: 0x5359
STRING: It wasn't logical to keep searching for us when Tokiwa was unconscious, and besides, she had no idea where we might be.

LABEL: 0x53B7
STRING: 「Touri――」

LABEL: 0x53D3
STRING: 「You couldn't find her either?」

LABEL: 0x546F
STRING: 「No, I haven't seen her.」

LABEL: 0x54F0
STRING: 「Wouldn't you know more about her than me...?」

LABEL: 0x5527
STRING: She hadn't seen her, huh?

LABEL: 0x554D
STRING: Yukari gave me a doubting look.

LABEL: 0x565B
STRING: What in the world was she doing?

LABEL: 0x5687
STRING: She'd been so agitated before. Where was she now, and what was she up to...?

LABEL: 0x57F9
STRING: 「After returning to the front section, Tokiwa-san and I took a break in the crew room for a while...」

LABEL: 0x5853
STRING: 「After she woke up, we attempted to restore power to the ship.」

LABEL: 0x5895
STRING: 「The results are as you can see.」

LABEL: 0x58C4
STRING: Yukari spread her arms wide as she said that.

LABEL: 0x58EA
STRING: Dim red light illuminated the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x5918
STRING: It may have been faint, but I was surprised that power was back up to the extent where I could see my surroundings at all.

LABEL: 0x596E
STRING: 「I had a hunch it was you...」

LABEL: 0x5A12
STRING: 「It's all thanks to Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x5A3F
STRING: So it was her, after all.

LABEL: 0x5A5D
STRING: Yukari sounded somehow proud as she spoke with sparkling eyes.

LABEL: 0x5AA6
STRING: 「She's a real genius.」

LABEL: 0x5AD2
STRING: 「A true genius――」

LABEL: 0x5B51
STRING: 「I was surprised.」

LABEL: 0x5B6D
STRING: 「Even though she said she didn't know much about hardware, she repaired the engine's power system in the blink of an eye.」

LABEL: 0x5BEE
STRING: According to her, they went to the power room looking for a possible malfunction in the power supply unit.

LABEL: 0x5C3C
STRING: ...I'd been around the ship many times, but I didn't recall an entrance to a place like that.

LABEL: 0x5CA4
STRING: 「How did you get there?」

LABEL: 0x5D3E
STRING: 「What? With the elevator.」

LABEL: 0x5D6D
STRING: 「With the elevator?」

LABEL: 0x5E2B
STRING: Come to think of it, there was that floor display plate I saw when I was trapped in the elevator with Touri.

LABEL: 0x5E77
STRING: So, the button below the first floor led to the power room.

LABEL: 0x5FD4
STRING: 「Yes, with the elevator.」

LABEL: 0x5FFC
STRING: 「It's actually connected to a floor below the first, so if you use a crew member's keycard you can get there.」

LABEL: 0x607A
STRING: 「As I explained before, the elevators are the only ones with independent power supplies, and that's partly in anticipation of emergencies like this.」

LABEL: 0x610F
STRING: I see...

LABEL: 0x6129
STRING: I had thought that the power outage this time had rendered even the elevator unusable.

LABEL: 0x6175
STRING: Now that I thought about it, the panel was broken to begin with.

LABEL: 0x61A9
STRING: So the elevator itself was usable...

LABEL: 0x624D
STRING: 「And so, when we visited the power room, she fixed it in the blink of an eye.」

LABEL: 0x62AA
STRING: 「How did she do that...?」

LABEL: 0x62E1
STRING: 「I didn't see what she did either.」

LABEL: 0x6319
STRING: 「I left the power room right away and left it to Tokiwa-san, so I don't know the details, but...」

LABEL: 0x639A
STRING: According to what she told me...

LABEL: 0x63D0
STRING: The <SHEEP III> was powered by hydrogen fuel.

LABEL: 0x6403
STRING: The fuel stored in the submarine was in the form of hydrogen storage alloys, which were located on the basement floor of the rear section.

LABEL: 0x64E3
STRING: 「In the power room, multiple hydrogen storage alloys are automatically switched

LABEL: 0x6527
STRING: to burn hydrogen and oxygen from the air,

LABEL: 0x656D
STRING: but it seems that the hydrogen fuel was not being switched.」

LABEL: 0x65BE
STRING: To put it simply, the battery had died and it wasn't being replaced.

LABEL: 0x6624
STRING: In other words, as long as you replaced the battery, the power would be restored――

LABEL: 0x666F
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san seems to have done something about the switching mechanism.」

LABEL: 0x66B9
STRING: 「Then again, the pipes used for that were actually physically damaged.」

LABEL: 0x6719
STRING: 「Apparently, she just switched to a new battery as an emergency measure.」

LABEL: 0x676A
STRING: Was that why it was so dark?

LABEL: 0x6792
STRING: So, the main computer in the wheelhouse was also silent because it didn't have enough power...

LABEL: 0x67FA
STRING: To say that the power had been restored was a bit of a stretch.

LABEL: 0x6822
STRING: However, if what Yukari was saying was true, there was hope.

LABEL: 0x6858
STRING: 「But if switching is the only problem, then the fuel itself...」

LABEL: 0x6910
STRING: 「Yes... Even if there's not much, we still have enough fuel to operate this ship for a few days.」

LABEL: 0x696E
STRING: 「Nevertheless, it's still not working properly.」

LABEL: 0x69AD
STRING: 「So, the power system isn't completely broken?」

LABEL: 0x69FE
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x6A21
STRING: We had some fuel left...

LABEL: 0x6A45
STRING: If we took the time to repair the pipes, we should be able to make use of it.

LABEL: 0x6A93
STRING: I guess that was one thing we'd learned.

LABEL: 0x6AC7
STRING: 「So... what did you do while she was repairing the power supply?」

LABEL: 0x6B77
STRING: 「There was no point in me staying there, so I've been checking on Hiragino-sensei and doing some research in the library.」

LABEL: 0x6BFF
STRING: 「The lights turned on, so I took the elevator back to the power room and listened to Tokiwa-san's explanation.」

LABEL: 0x6C79
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san went into the laboratory saying there was something she needed to do there afterward.」

LABEL: 0x6CC9
STRING: 「Then, I was looking around the ship to find the two of you again when...」

LABEL: 0x6D2A
STRING: So that was when she found me.

LABEL: 0x6D5C
STRING: 「By the way, how's Hiragino-san doing?」

LABEL: 0x6E23
STRING: Yukari seemed a little hesitant.

LABEL: 0x6E5A
STRING: 「Eventually, I gave him a shot of medicine and he fell asleep.」

LABEL: 0x6EEF
STRING: 「He seemed to be under undue stress from some sense of obligation, so I was somewhat pushy...」

LABEL: 0x6F4E
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x6F6A
STRING: Even though he was sick,

LABEL: 0x6FA0
STRING: being unable to escape his sense of responsibility as a doctor and an adult certainly wasn't a good thing.

LABEL: 0x706E
STRING: 「But, he's fast asleep right now.」

LABEL: 0x70A2
STRING: 「...He keeps talking in his sleep, though.」

LABEL: 0x70D5
STRING: 「Ha ha...」

LABEL: 0x70FE
STRING: 「If you have time, please go to the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x7197
STRING: 「He really is reckless...」

LABEL: 0x71D0
STRING: Yukari murmured quietly, but judging by the tone of her voice, his condition must be stable enough.

LABEL: 0x722C
STRING: He didn't seem well at all earlier, so I felt relieved...

LABEL: 0x726E
STRING: All that was left was Touri... What had happened to her?

LABEL: 0x72B6
STRING: Was there anything I could use as a hint?

LABEL: 0x72EA
STRING: I thought about what Yukari had just told me and searched my memories, but I couldn't figure anything out.

LABEL: 0x7392
STRING: 「By the way――」

LABEL: 0x73B0
STRING: 「When I arrived here earlier...」

LABEL: 0x73E8
STRING: 「You seemed surprised by something. Did something happen?」

LABEL: 0x7435
STRING: When she arrived here...?

LABEL: 0x7455
STRING: ――That's right.

LABEL: 0x7489
STRING: I quickly turned around.

LABEL: 0x74AB
STRING: The computer was as silent as ever.

LABEL: 0x74CF
STRING: And beside it was――

LABEL: 0x74ED
STRING: 「Actually, this thing here...」

LABEL: 0x7543
STRING: Yukari shifted her eyes to the equipment behind me.

LABEL: 0x7583
STRING: To the powered-off computer in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x75B3
STRING: And, to the communication equipment beside it.

LABEL: 0x7659
STRING: 「The communication equipment has been destroyed?!」

LABEL: 0x768E
STRING: She was stunned.

LABEL: 0x76B0
STRING: ...So, she hadn't noticed after all.

LABEL: 0x76FC
STRING: It was hard to imagine that Yukari hadn't visited this place since the power was restored,

LABEL: 0x774C
STRING: so when did this computer get destroyed?

LABEL: 0x7794
STRING: She ran over to me.

LABEL: 0x7822
STRING: 「This is bad...」

LABEL: 0x789B
STRING: 「Don't tell me you did this...?」

LABEL: 0x78C6
STRING: 「It was already like this when I came here.」

LABEL: 0x7900
STRING: 「Someone must've struck it with that fire extinguisher.」

LABEL: 0x793C
STRING: 「As I thought, there's someone on this ship who's trying to prevent us from escaping...」

LABEL: 0x7A0A
STRING: 「...There's no doubt about it.」

LABEL: 0x7A34
STRING: 「There's a saboteur lurking inside the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x7A67
STRING: 「I only had a feeling until now, but now that it's come to this...」

LABEL: 0x7B1C
STRING: 「...I have no choice but to believe it.」

LABEL: 0x7B51
STRING: Her lips trembled as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x7B81
STRING: As a chief attendant and ROMLES employee, the presence of this saboteur must be a painful reality to her.

LABEL: 0x7BD5
STRING: I couldn't bear to watch her bite her lip as if blaming herself.

LABEL: 0x7C27
STRING: We needed to find out who they were as soon as possible.

LABEL: 0x7C5B
STRING: The existence of this unquestionable saboteur.

LABEL: 0x7C9F
STRING: The problem was――

LABEL: 0x7CB7
STRING: Narrowing it down to who it could be...

LABEL: 0x7CE7
STRING: The number of people who could enter this room was limited in the first place...

LABEL: 0x7D2D
STRING: 「Yukari-san... Where's your keycard?」

LABEL: 0x7D7F
STRING: She rummaged through her pocket with a bewildered expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x7E1F
STRING: 「I... don't have it...」

LABEL: 0x7E44
STRING: 「When you came up from the power room in the elevator with Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x7EFE
STRING: 「I should have had it then, of course.」

LABEL: 0x7F31
STRING: In that case, she must have dropped it after that. Or perhaps it was stolen.

LABEL: 0x7FED
STRING: 「I can't believe I let something like this happen...」

LABEL: 0x8024
STRING: 「No... There's no guarantee that the saboteur used that key.」

LABEL: 0x8060
STRING: 「Every door was probably left unlocked during the blackout.」

LABEL: 0x80AC
STRING: Right. What we needed to think about was the timing of the communication equipment being destroyed...

LABEL: 0x80FA
STRING: 「When was the last time you visited the wheelhouse?」

LABEL: 0x8194
STRING: 「Hmm, it was probably around seven...」

LABEL: 0x81BF
STRING: 「As soon as I left Tokiwa, I came here to check the computer, but...」

LABEL: 0x8218
STRING: 「Nothing had happened by then?」

LABEL: 0x8246
STRING: She crossed her arms, trying to remember.

LABEL: 0x82DE
STRING: 「I confirmed that the computers could be turned on, but not the communications equipment――」

LABEL: 0x833F
STRING: 「W-Wait a second.」

LABEL: 0x8369
STRING: 「Did you try to see if the computer worked?」

LABEL: 0x839B
STRING: 「The power's off, but...」

LABEL: 0x83C3
STRING: I looked at the still-silent computer.

LABEL: 0x83F7
STRING: Wasn't this because it didn't have any power...?

LABEL: 0x8495
STRING: 「I deliberately shut it off so that it wouldn't waste what little power we have.」

LABEL: 0x853E
STRING: 「I left the wheelhouse for a bit and I didn't think it would be of much use in this situation.」

LABEL: 0x8593
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x85C0
STRING: 「...For some time now...」

LABEL: 0x863B
STRING: 「It feels like you've been interrogating me.」

LABEL: 0x8678
STRING: 「No, that's not it...」

LABEL: 0x86A4
STRING: I denied it immediately, but then remembered something.

LABEL: 0x87D0
STRING: It was a bit late to be thinking this, but Hiragino had forced the role of a detective on me previously.

LABEL: 0x882A
STRING: He had told me to find the culprit who had hurt Reiri.

LABEL: 0x886C
STRING: I hadn't given it much thought until now, but...

LABEL: 0x88A6
STRING: As a result, things were unfolding exactly as he'd said.

LABEL: 0x88EA
STRING: It was unconscious, but maybe I had become aware of that role somewhere along the way.

LABEL: 0x89BD
STRING: ――That said.

LABEL: 0x89D9
STRING: In the end, I didn't understand a single thing.

LABEL: 0x8A01
STRING: I didn't even know who had attacked Reiri.

LABEL: 0x8A45
STRING: Even Yukari's statement didn't help me pinpoint the timing of the communication equipment being destroyed at all.

LABEL: 0x8A95
STRING: Then again, I wasn't sure what I would do with that information.

LABEL: 0x8ADB
STRING: It was too much for me to figure out the truth by myself.

LABEL: 0x8C18
STRING: 「...Let me confirm one thing.」

LABEL: 0x8C42
STRING: 「I know this is a weird question, but...」

LABEL: 0x8C6E
STRING: 「Is there some kind of a hidden room on this ship?」

LABEL: 0x8CC7
STRING: 「There's nothing like that.」

LABEL: 0x8CF4
STRING: Yukari answered immediately.

LABEL: 0x8D0E
STRING: Suspicious...? I might be a bit paranoid. But in a way, a room that passengers couldn't enter,

LABEL: 0x8D4A
STRING: like the power room, could be called a hidden room.

LABEL: 0x8D9E
STRING: She could have mentioned that.

LABEL: 0x8E29
STRING: Yukari looked up with sharp eyes.

LABEL: 0x8E64
STRING: 「Why are you suspecting me?」

LABEL: 0x8EF7
STRING: 「If you think I'm still hiding something, then that's a problem.」

LABEL: 0x8F3C
STRING: 「...When we were searching for Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x8F66
STRING: 「We searched every room from the third floor to the first, but couldn't find her.」

LABEL: 0x8FC8
STRING: 「Besides...」

LABEL: 0x8FE4
STRING: 「If that man who was spraying soporific smoke wasn't part of the rescue team,

LABEL: 0x902E
STRING: then it's reasonable to assume he was hiding somewhere on the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x9075
STRING: 「...In a room we didn't know about.」

LABEL: 0x90A9
STRING: I didn't say it without thinking.

LABEL: 0x90D9
STRING: Something clearly strange was happening inside this submarine.

LABEL: 0x911D
STRING: Touri, who should have been here, was nowhere to be found, and a man who shouldn't have been here had appeared...

LABEL: 0x916F
STRING: The simplest answer to those mysteries was a hidden room.

LABEL: 0x9241
STRING: 「I understand what you're getting at, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x9273
STRING: 「I'm relieved that you didn't speak without any basis.」

LABEL: 0x934A
STRING: 「However, it's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x9375
STRING: Her words were strict.

LABEL: 0x939D
STRING: She closed her eyes with her arms still crossed.

LABEL: 0x93D4
STRING: 「As for Touri-san, I have my doubts as well.」

LABEL: 0x940C
STRING: 「This is just my guess, but...」

LABEL: 0x9442
STRING: 「Perhaps for some reason, she's running away from us?」

LABEL: 0x9495
STRING: 「Running away?」

LABEL: 0x94B7
STRING: She was running away from us?

LABEL: 0x94E9
STRING: But why――

LABEL: 0x9505
STRING: Despite my question, Yukari continued.

LABEL: 0x95A5
STRING: 「As you know...」

LABEL: 0x95C3
STRING: 「Sounds echo inside the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x95FA
STRING: 「You could easily notice someone approaching from the sounds alone.」

LABEL: 0x9640
STRING: 「Besides, there were several of us searching in a group,

LABEL: 0x9682
STRING: so it should be possible for her to hear our footsteps and run away each time she heard us.」

LABEL: 0x96CF
STRING: 「...Is it really that simple?」

LABEL: 0x9767
STRING: 「...We never considered the possibility that she was "running away" from us.」

LABEL: 0x97C7
STRING: 「It's not impossible if you're careful, since you're trying to avoid people who aren't actively chasing you.」

LABEL: 0x9882
STRING: 「Also, the front section of the <SHEEP III> is circular.」

LABEL: 0x98C3
STRING: 「There are no "dead ends" in a circular hallway...」

LABEL: 0x98FB
STRING: 「It wouldn't be hard to hide and keep running.」

LABEL: 0x993E
STRING: ...It was definitely possible.

LABEL: 0x9964
STRING: Yukari's explanation made sense.

LABEL: 0x9988
STRING: But that was exactly why...

LABEL: 0x99AA
STRING: 「――Is she really running away from us?」

LABEL: 0x9A68
STRING: 「Think about it.」

LABEL: 0x9A84
STRING: 「Reiri-san was strangled by someone.」

LABEL: 0x9AAA
STRING: 「The culprit's inside the same ship as her.」

LABEL: 0x9AD8
STRING: 「――And if we believe her words, they're one of the people who's now searching for her.」

LABEL: 0x9BAF
STRING: 「Isn't it only natural to try to and run away?」

LABEL: 0x9BEC
STRING: It was true that Reiri was the one who had said that the culprit was one of us.

LABEL: 0x9C32
STRING: If the culprit found her under the pretense of saving her, she might be killed for sure...

LABEL: 0x9C8E
STRING: 「But then...」

LABEL: 0x9CB6
STRING: 「There were several occasions when all of us, including Reiri, were all together.」

LABEL: 0x9D00
STRING: 「At those times, Reiri didn't seem particularly scared...」

LABEL: 0x9D48
STRING: 「――Despite the fact that there was someone who had strangled her among us.」

LABEL: 0x9E02
STRING: 「"Even if the culprit is here, they won't be able to touch me in front of everyone." ...What if she was thinking along those lines?」

LABEL: 0x9E72
STRING: 「These are all just theories, so there's no way to know for sure now.」

LABEL: 0x9F21
STRING: 「...I wish I could have asked her myself.」

LABEL: 0x9F74
STRING: Yukari lowered her eyes.

LABEL: 0x9F90
STRING: An image of Touri from earlier overlapped with her.

LABEL: 0x9FB8
STRING: The death of a fellow survivor on the <SHEEP III>――

LABEL: 0x9FE9
STRING: It weighed heavily on all of us, and not just Touri, who was her relative.

LABEL: 0xA0A7
STRING: 「That's my explanation for Touri-san's actions.」

LABEL: 0xA0DF
STRING: 「As for that man――」

LABEL: 0xA109
STRING: 「It's only natural to assume that he came by the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0xA14A
STRING: 「Still, I don't think he had any intention of rescuing us.」

LABEL: 0xA18E
STRING: 「As far as the ROMLES rescue team is concerned...」

LABEL: 0xA1C0
STRING: ROMLES had gone out of their way to send that rescue ship...

LABEL: 0xA1FE
STRING: If they didn't come here to save us, then what was the point?

LABEL: 0xA24A
STRING: And how was it possible that they would not contact Yukari at all, who also belonged to ROMLES?

LABEL: 0xA312
STRING: 「This is another theory I have.」

LABEL: 0xA366
STRING: 「What if the rescue ship was taken over by terrorists?」

LABEL: 0xA3A0
STRING: 「And, what if we assume that that man was said terrorist?」

LABEL: 0xA3F5
STRING: 「That sounds awfully convenient――」

LABEL: 0xA489
STRING: 「It's not that I actually think terrorists boarded this ship.」

LABEL: 0xA53C
STRING: 「What I want to say is...」

LABEL: 0xA55E
STRING: 「To say that the man inside that ROMLES rescue ship and the ROMLES rescue team are the same...」

LABEL: 0xA5A8
STRING: 「...It's too early to think that way.」

LABEL: 0xA5EB
STRING: Now that she mentioned it, it made sense.

LABEL: 0xA60F
STRING: He wasn't originally inside the <SHEEP III> but had come aboard via the rescue ship...

LABEL: 0xA666
STRING: Calling him a terrorist was a little much, but it was more plausible than saying he'd been lurking on the ship the whole time.

LABEL: 0xA742
STRING: 「Anyway, whether it's Reiri-san or that man's existence, there are explanations.」

LABEL: 0xA792
STRING: 「There's no need to assume that it was all because of a hidden room.」

LABEL: 0xA83B
STRING: 「If I had to say...」

LABEL: 0xA85D
STRING: 「The basement floor I went to with Tokiwa-san earlier would be the closest thing to one.」

LABEL: 0xA88F
STRING: 「It's an area that neither passengers nor ordinary crew can enter.」

LABEL: 0xA8DB
STRING: 「However, the security there is strict, and there was no sign of anyone else entering.」

LABEL: 0xA958
STRING: So, there was no one on the basement floor, either, huh...?

LABEL: 0xA988
STRING: Which meant there was no space left in the submarine for anyone to hide in.

LABEL: 0xA9DD
STRING: 「Regardless...」

LABEL: 0xAA04
STRING: Yukari looked up.

LABEL: 0xAA20
STRING: Her eyes were sharp.

LABEL: 0xAAA6
STRING: 「Reiri-san and that man are already dead.」

LABEL: 0xAADC
STRING: 「Therefore, they couldn't have destroyed the communication equipment like this.」

LABEL: 0xAB18
STRING: 「The perpetrator is limited to us who are still alive...」

LABEL: 0xABE3
STRING: 「It's not just about this, either.」

LABEL: 0xAC11
STRING: 「Reiri-san said that one of us had strangled her.」

LABEL: 0xACDA
STRING: 「And the only ones left alive now are...」

LABEL: 0xAF63
STRING: 「One of them is our saboteur.」

LABEL: 0xB08C
STRING: 「I wonder who the culprit could be?」

LABEL: 0xB0DB
STRING: Yukari asked a provocative question.

LABEL: 0xB0FB
STRING: I knew very well what she was trying to say.

LABEL: 0xB129
STRING: Touri's whereabouts were still unknown.

LABEL: 0xB14D
STRING: Tokiwa was holed up in the laboratory.

LABEL: 0xB179
STRING: Hiragino was fast asleep in the emergency room...

LABEL: 0xB1A1
STRING: 「...Are you suspecting me?」

LABEL: 0xB237
STRING: 「I'm saying there's a good chance.」

LABEL: 0xB25F
STRING: 「After all, you're the one who sank this ship.」

LABEL: 0xB33C
STRING: The unmistakable truth.

LABEL: 0xB35C
STRING: The one responsible for the <SHEEP III's> current situation was me.

LABEL: 0xB3FA
STRING: No matter how much dedication and effort I put in afterward,

LABEL: 0xB43C
STRING: what I had done would not disappear.

LABEL: 0xB46C
STRING: It made sense why she would suspect me.

LABEL: 0xB4F1
STRING: ...However.

LABEL: 0xB50B
STRING: If my reputation was to be damaged, so be it.

LABEL: 0xB53D
STRING: That couldn't be helped.

LABEL: 0xB557
STRING: But, letting the culprit get away because of that was a different matter.

LABEL: 0xB595
STRING: This wasn't a matter of my pride.

LABEL: 0xB65D
STRING: I glared back at Yukari.

LABEL: 0xB6DC
STRING: Seeing me like that, she suddenly smiled.

LABEL: 0xB71C
STRING: 「...Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0xB749
STRING: 「I'm just kidding.」

LABEL: 0xB765
STRING: 「Don't worry.」

LABEL: 0xB783
STRING: 「Despite what it might seem like, I trust you.」

LABEL: 0xB7D0
STRING: Yukari smiled slightly, which was a stark difference from the stern expression she'd had until now.

LABEL: 0xB820
STRING: I was grateful for that in and of itself... but on the other hand, I couldn't help but think it might be some kind of trap.

LABEL: 0xB878
STRING: 「...What makes you trust me?」

LABEL: 0xB91C
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0xB938
STRING: 「The fact that you're her younger brother.」

LABEL: 0xB997
STRING: My sister――

LABEL: 0xB9AF
STRING: I was at a loss for words at her sudden mention of her relationship with my sister.

LABEL: 0xB9EF
STRING: Yukari looked off into the distance as she spoke.

LABEL: 0xBA95
STRING: 「Up until now, I've been paying close attention to your actions here on the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0xBAE8
STRING: 「At first, it was because I was suspicious of you...」

LABEL: 0xBB24
STRING: 「I was watching closely when you would fall apart.」

LABEL: 0xBB6D
STRING: I didn't need to be told.

LABEL: 0xBB8F
STRING: I had been the catalyst for the sinking, and I wasn't going to get away with what I did.

LABEL: 0xBBF3
STRING: So, it hadn't been just my imagination that I'd felt Yukari's stern gaze on me from time to time.

LABEL: 0xBC54
STRING: 「I watched you closely...」

LABEL: 0xBCED
STRING: 「...And eventually, my suspicions about you disappeared.」

LABEL: 0xBD29
STRING: 「You took the initiative and took on dangerous tasks by yourself.」

LABEL: 0xBD63
STRING: 「You used yourself as a shield to protect us.」

LABEL: 0xBDA0
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0xBE28
STRING: 「At first, I thought it was just for show.」

LABEL: 0xBE58
STRING: 「Trying to escape our notice by keeping up an appearance like that... That's what I thought you were doing.」

LABEL: 0xBF1F
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0xBF40
STRING: She turned to me and smiled again.

LABEL: 0xBFE2
STRING: 「...I guess that sense of justice comes from your sister.」

LABEL: 0xC025
STRING: ――You're wrong.

LABEL: 0xC03D
STRING: I stopped myself before I could shout out words of denial.

LABEL: 0xC0FB
STRING: No, that's not it, Yukari.

LABEL: 0xC11D
STRING: I'm not an honest person like that.

LABEL: 0xC14D
STRING: I can't even tell right from wrong.

LABEL: 0xC189
STRING: I don't know what "justice" is.

LABEL: 0xC1B1
STRING: Out of everyone on this ship, I was probably the one who understood it the least.

LABEL: 0xC250
STRING: Take Tokiwa, for example.

LABEL: 0xC26C
STRING: She loved all life and acted according to her own beliefs, even if she was sometimes eccentric.

LABEL: 0xC2CE
STRING: Yes, according to her own beliefs.

LABEL: 0xC304
STRING: What were my beliefs?

LABEL: 0xC326
STRING: What was I basing my judgments on?

LABEL: 0xC358
STRING: Looking back, I had always made decisions based only on my emotions.

LABEL: 0xC3C4
STRING: Knowing nothing about responsibility or excuses.

LABEL: 0xC41C
STRING: So please, don't look at me with such kind eyes――

LABEL: 0xC55B
STRING: 「You're wrong, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0xC57B
STRING: 「I'm nothing like that.」

LABEL: 0xC5D9
STRING: In other words, what I was doing was just that... Atonement.

LABEL: 0xC60B
STRING: I was merely trying to run away from what had caused this outcome.

LABEL: 0xC659
STRING: I only wanted forgiveness... There was no way you could talk about justice in the face of such shallowness.

LABEL: 0xC7AC
STRING: 「Justice is something that doesn't ask for anything in return.」

LABEL: 0xC7F4
STRING: 「It's about doing what you feel is right in your heart.」

LABEL: 0xC834
STRING: 「It doesn't matter if you're right or wrong.」

LABEL: 0xC872
STRING: 「Because whatever you do will still be justice.」

LABEL: 0xC91A
STRING: The justice my sister had spoken of.

LABEL: 0xC93A
STRING: It was similar to love.

LABEL: 0xC95C
STRING: Something that had to be done, no matter who it was for.

LABEL: 0xC992
STRING: A desire to accomplish something and not ask for anything in return.

LABEL: 0xC9D2
STRING: I was nothing more than a hypocrite acting solely to escape from my sins.

LABEL: 0xCA1C
STRING: And yet――

LABEL: 0xCB44
STRING: 「I... owe her a great debt of gratitude.」

LABEL: 0xCB90
STRING: 「At this point I can no longer pay her back, but...」

LABEL: 0xCC63
STRING: 「So, if you really are her brother...」

LABEL: 0xCC9D
STRING: 「It's you I should pay it back to.」

LABEL: 0xCCFC
STRING: She owed her.

LABEL: 0xCD1A
STRING: I didn't know what exactly she meant by that.

LABEL: 0xCD48
STRING: And, I didn't think I had the right to accept what she wanted to give back to my sister right now.

LABEL: 0xCDA6
STRING: But it wasn't over yet.

LABEL: 0xCDD4
STRING: Yukari trusted me.

LABEL: 0xCDFA
STRING: Regardless of my own self-esteem, I was done jumping at shadows.

LABEL: 0xCE3C
STRING: Despite the situation inside the <SHEEP III>, I was ready to pick things up from here on.

LABEL: 0xCE91
STRING: Or, so it should have been...

LABEL: 0xCEBA
STRING: 「...But, it doesn't matter now.」

LABEL: 0xCEE9
STRING: She whispered it so quietly that I almost missed it.

LABEL: 0xCF19
STRING: Before I could ask her what she meant, she continued.

LABEL: 0xCFCF
STRING: 「Katagiri... Hitose.」

LABEL: 0xCFED
STRING: 「Your brother...」

LABEL: 0xD013
STRING: 「I... couldn't save you.」

LABEL: 0xD048
STRING: "Couldn't" save?

LABEL: 0xD070
STRING: A careless past tense.

LABEL: 0xD08E
STRING: Did she make a mistake? I wasn't sure.

LABEL: 0xD0B6
STRING: 「――What are you talking about?」

LABEL: 0xD0DE
STRING: 「This isn't over yet, is it?」

LABEL: 0xD10E
STRING: 「If you're giving up on finding a way to survive now――」

LABEL: 0xD1BC
STRING: 「A way to survive?」

LABEL: 0xD209
STRING: Yukari chuckled ominously.

LABEL: 0xD235
STRING: Her expression was self-deprecating, a far cry from her earlier gentleness.

LABEL: 0xD27D
STRING: It reminded me of Reiri――

LABEL: 0xD30F
STRING: 「It's too late to do anything now.」

LABEL: 0xD398
STRING: 「――It's all over.」

LABEL: 0xD3C0
STRING: 「We can't leave this place anymore.」
